name: MechaWrecker
description:
Search the environment, collect material and upgrade your robot, take down other players and be the first to escape with the boss robots head. PC or Android device compatible 

Controls (PC / Android): 

  1. W,A,S,D / Left Joystick (Move Character: Up, Left, Down, Right)
  2. Mouse Move / Right Joystick (Aim)
  3. Left Click / Red 'Fire' Button (Fire)
  4. R Key / Brown 'Reload' Button (Reload)
  5. Shift / Blue 'Dash' Button (Dash - Uses Energy)
  6. Space / Engine Button  (Jump/Fly - Uses Energy)
  7. Escape / 'Menu' Button (Opens Upgrade Menu, Click or Press to Purchase Upgrade)
